        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    var currentTableName = current.getValue('table_name');
    var currentInternalName = current.getValue('internal_name');
    var previousInternalName = previous.getValue('internal_name');

    if (previousInternalName && previousInternalName !== currentInternalName) {
        var errorMessage = gs.getMessage('Internal name cannot be modified for existing record');
        gs.addErrorMessage(errorMessage);
        current.setAbortAction(true);
        return;
    }

    if (currentInternalName === 'translation_item') {
        errorMessage = gs.getMessage('Invalid internal name "translation_item" containing restricted keyword(s). Please enter new value(s).');
        gs.addErrorMessage(errorMessage);
        current.setAbortAction(true);
        return;
    }

    if (current.getValue('active') === '1' && !current.getValue('read_script') && !current.getValue('processor_script')) {
        errorMessage = gs.getMessage('Either a Processor script or a Read script is required for an active artifact configuration');
        gs.addErrorMessage(errorMessage);
        current.setAbortAction(true);
        return;
    }

    var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_lf_config');
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var tableName = gr.getValue('table_name');
        var internalName = gr.getValue('internal_name');
        var isDifferent = gr.getValue('sys_id') !== current.getValue('sys_id');
        if (isDifferent) {
            if (tableName === currentTableName) {
                errorMessage = gs.getMessage('A configuration record already exists for the table: {0}', current.getDisplayValue('table_name'));
                gs.addErrorMessage(errorMessage);
                current.setAbortAction(true);
                break;
            }

            if (internalName === currentInternalName) {
                errorMessage = gs.getMessage('A configuration record already exists with internal name: {0}', current.getDisplayValue('internal_name'));
                gs.addErrorMessage(errorMessage);
                current.setAbortAction(true);
                break;
            }
        }
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script>
